summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the transfer of real property from King County to the City of Seattle; authorizing the Mayor to enter into an intergovernmental land transfer agreement with King County providing for the transfer to the City of three parcels of real property located at 9026 4th Avenue South in the South Park neighborhood for park, recreation, and open space purposes; authorizing acceptance of the deeds; and exempting future transfer of two of the parcels from the provisions and requirements of Ordinance 118477.
